constituent: fight, gates, beans, table, one, mouth, glue
koohiiStory1: During the saloon brawl, one guy got glued to a table and was tossed out through the saloon gates. But he really wanted to fight, so he ran back through those gates (with the table still glued to his back) only to be tossed out again. Imagine him repeatedly running in and being tossed back out.
koohiiStory2: Food fight! Look, beans are stuck to the gates like glue.
